member.name: F:Panini.ViewModel.ConfigViewModel.ignoreTopicNameEndsWith
member.summary: A list of ending strings to invalidate web-topics.
member.value: Represents a set of substrings which when matched at the end of the web-topic names, results in the topic being ignored from the TFIDF analysis.

member.name: F:Panini.ViewModel.ConfigViewModel.ignoreTopicNameStartsWith
member.summary: A list of starting strings to ivalidate web-topics.
member.value: Represents a set of substrings which when matched at the beginning of the web-topic names, results in the topic being ignored from the TFIDF analysis.

member.name: F:Panini.ViewModel.ConfigViewModel.ignoreTopicNameContains
member.summary: A list of strings to invalidate web-topics.
member.value: Represents a set of substrings which when matched anywhere in the web-topic names, results in the topic being ignored from the TFIDF analysis.

member.name: F:Panini.ViewModel.ConfigViewModel.ignoreTopicName
member.summary: A list of topic names used to invalidate web-topics.
member.value: Represents a set of substrings which when matched at the end of the web-topic names, results in the topic being ignored from the TFIDF analysis.

member.value: This property binds the text of the ignoreEndWith text box in the settings view.

member.value: This property binds the text in the ignoreContains text box in the settings view.

member.summary: A list of strings to invalidate web-topics.

member.name: P:Panini.ViewModel.ConfigViewModel.IgnoreTopicNameStartsWith

member.value: This property binds the text in the ignoreStartWith text box in the settings view.

member.name: F:Panini.ViewModel.ConfigViewModel._colorScheme
member.summary: Color scheme backing field.
member.value:
Backing field for the color scheme of the heatmap.
The default value is Default.

member.name: F:Panini.ViewModel.ConfigViewModel._accelerators
member.summary: Accelerators backing field.
member.value: Backing field for the accelerators proposed for parallel computing.

member.name: P:Panini.ViewModel.ConfigViewModel.SelectionMode
member.summary: Selection mode backing field. This property binds to the selected item of Selectors radio button group in the settings view.
member.value:
Selection mode for the parent container tag which encapsulates are related links.
InnerText Lets you select the tag using the innerText attribute value of the tag.
CSS Lets you select the tag using the CSS Selector.
The default value is InnerText.

member.name: P:Panini.ViewModel.ConfigViewModel.IsGetParentTagActive
member.summary: Flag to look for parent element when selecting the container for related links. This property binds to getParentTagCheckbox in the settings view.

item.description: Looks for a parent tag of the selected tag, as the container for related links.
Considers the selected tag as container for related links.

member.name: P:Panini.ViewModel.ConfigViewModel.QueryString
member.summary: String input for passing the innert text or the CSS selector. This property binds to queryTextBox in the settings view.
member.value:
Represents following two scenarios:
When is InnerText, this property expects the headings of the related links section e.g. See Also or Related Topics.
When is CSS, this property expects the CSS selector of the parent element of the related links e.g. #See_also.

member.name: P:Panini.ViewModel.ConfigViewModel.ParentLevel
member.summary: The parent level of the selected tag. This property binds to the text of parentLevel text box in the settings view.
member.value: The nth level parent of the selected tag to be considered as the container for related links.

member.name: P:Panini.ViewModel.ConfigViewModel.Devices
member.summary: List of accelerators devices. This property binds to acceleratorsList list box in the settings view.
member.value: List of accelerators available for parallel computing e.g. CPU or GPU.

member.name: P:Panini.ViewModel.ConfigViewModel.AccleratorDevice
member.summary: Selected accelerator. This property binds to the selected item of acceleratorsList list box in the settings view.
member.value: The selected accelerator for parallel computing e.g. CPU or GPU.

member.name: P:Panini.ViewModel.ConfigViewModel.ColorScheme
member.summary: Color scheme of the heatmap. This property binds to ColorScheme radio button group.
member.value:
Color scheme of the heatmap of similarity scores.
Default Uses a purple gradient color pallete.
Hot Uses a red gradient color pallete.
Cold Uses a blue gradient color pallete.
HotCold Uses a mixed gradient color pallete of red and blue colors.

member.name: P:Panini.ViewModel.ConfigViewModel.KeywordCount
member.summary: Number of keywords to be displayed in the results. This property binds to keywordCount text box in the settings view.
member.value: The default value is 5.

member.name: P:Panini.ViewModel.ConfigViewModel.SimilarTopicCount
member.summary: Number of similar topic suggestions to be displayed in the results. This property binds to similarTopicCount text box in the settings view.
member.value: The default value is 5.

member.name: P:Panini.ViewModel.ConfigViewModel.MaxVocabSize
member.summary: Maximum vocabulary size of the lexicon. This property binds to vocabSize text box in the settings view.
member.value:
Represents the maximum number of words allowed to be part of the lexicon. The n most popular words from all topic are extracted and used for TFIDF and Similarity score computation.
Important: The larger the MaxVocabSize the longer will be the TFIDF vectors and the longer it will take to compute the scores.

member.summary: Initializes the settings view with default values.

member.value: A list of instances for each similar topic suggestion.

members.member:
Selected similar topic.
The instance corresponding to the selected similar topic instance.

member.name: P:Panini.ViewModel.ResultsViewModel.maxVisibleSimilarTopics
member.summary: Maximum visible similar topics.
member.value: The highest number of topics to be suggested under the Similar Topics section in the results view.

member.name: P:Panini.ViewModel.ResultsViewModel.ProgressBarVisibility
member.summary: Controls visibility of the progress bar.
member.value: Controls visibility of the progress bar that appears in the status bar when creating lexicon and computing scores.

member.name: P:Panini.ViewModel.ResultsViewModel.ResultsVisibility
member.summary: Controls visibility of sections in results view.
member.value:
Controls visiblity of the Topics List, Similar Topics, and Topic Summary sections in the results view.
The sections must be hidden during the processing phase.

member.name: F:Panini.ViewModel.ResultsViewModel._processingMessageVisibility
member.summary: Flag to display the processing prompt.

member.name: P:Panini.ViewModel.ResultsViewModel.ProcessingMessageVisibility
member.summary: Controls visibility of the processing message.
member.value: Controls the visibility of the processing message in the results view when the topics are being processed and score are being computed.

member.name: P:Panini.ViewModel.ResultsViewModel.ProcessingStage
member.summary: Current processing stage message.
member.value:
Current processing stage message from the following:
Generating Lexicon and Topic Instances
Calculating TFIDF Scores
Calculating Cosine Similarity Scores

member.name: P:Panini.ViewModel.ResultsViewModel.Status
member.summary: Status message. This property binds to status text block in the load view.
member.value: String representation of the status message to be displayed in the status bar at the bottom.

member.name: P:Panini.ViewModel.ResultsViewModel.StatusBarColor
member.summary: Status color. This property binds to statusColorBrush in the laod view.
member.value: Color of the status bar.

member.name: F:Panini.ViewModel.ResultsViewModel.stopwatch
member.summary: Stopwatch.
member.value: Stopwatch for timing the processing stages.

member.name: P:Panini.ViewModel.ResultsViewModel.TopicGenerationTime
member.summary: Topic generation and lexicon creation time.
member.value: Time (in secs) required to instantiate classes and create .

member.name: P:Panini.ViewModel.ResultsViewModel.TFIDFComputationTime
member.summary: TFIDF score computation time.
member.value: Time (in secs) required to instantiate classes for each topic and compute TFIDF scores.

member.name: P:Panini.ViewModel.ResultsViewModel.SimScoreComputationTime
member.summary: Similarity score computation time.
member.value: Time (in secs) required to compute cosine similarity scores for each topic.

member.summary: Summary info of all topics.

member.summary: NLP data of the performed ananlysis

member.name: P:Panini.ViewModel.SummaryViewModel.LinksSummary
member.summary: Links data of all topics.
member.value: The class instance that stores the information about links like total number of existing links (inline and related links), proposed links, matching links.

member.summary: Plot model for the heatmap.
member.value: The handle of the plot for configuring axes and series of the plot.

member.summary: Preview model.
member.value: The plot model corresponding to the preview part of the heatmap.

member.name: P:Panini.ViewModel.SummaryViewModel.IsHeatMapExpanded
member.summary: State of the heatmap expander.
member.value: If true the headmap expander is expanded, else it is collpased.

member.name: P:Panini.ViewModel.SummaryViewModel.IsHeatmapVisible
member.summary: Visibility of the heatmap expander.
member.value: If true the headmap expander is visibile, else it is collpased.

member.name: P:Panini.ViewModel.SummaryViewModel.VerticalSliderPosition
member.summary: Vertical slider postition.
member.value:
The position of the vertical slider on the preview part of the heatmap.
This position is used for computing the part of the window to be displayed in the main heat map.

member.name: P:Panini.ViewModel.SummaryViewModel.HorizontalSliderPosition
member.summary: Horizontal slider postition.
member.value:
The position of the horizontal slider on the preview part of the heatmap.
This position is used for computing the part of the window to be displayed in the main heat map.

member.name: P:Panini.ViewModel.SummaryViewModel.SliderMax
member.summary: Slider max value.
member.value: The maximum value for each slider on the heatmap preview.

member.name: P:Panini.ViewModel.SummaryViewModel.KernelSize
member.summary: Kernel size.
member.value:
The window size of the heatmap.
The default value is 10.

member.name: P:Panini.ViewModel.SummaryViewModel.IsPreviewVisible
member.summary: Visibility of the heatmap preview expander.
member.value: If true the headmap preview expander is visibile, else it is collpased.

member.name: P:Panini.ViewModel.SummaryViewModel.IsPreviewExpanded
member.summary: State of the heatmap preview expander.
member.value: If true the headmap preview expander is expanded, else it is collpased.

member.summary: Command to generate heatmap data.

member.name: M:Panini.ViewModel.SummaryViewModel.generate_topics_info
member.summary: Generates summary information on topics, which includes the total number of topics in the directory, number of valid and igonred topics.

member.name: M:Panini.ViewModel.SummaryViewModel.generate_links_info
member.summary: Generates summary information on links in topics, which includes number of exiting links (inline and reltaed links).

member.name: M:Panini.ViewModel.SummaryViewModel.get_count_of_all_rel_links
member.summary: Counts the total related links in all the topics.
member.returns: The total number of related links in all the topics of the corpus.

member.name: M:Panini.ViewModel.SummaryViewModel.get_count_of_all_inline_links
member.summary: Counts all inline links in topics of the corpus.
member.returns: The total number of inline links present in all topics of the corpus.

member.name: M:Panini.ViewModel.SummaryViewModel.get_count_of_all_proposed_links
member.summary: Counts all links proposed as similar topics in the results.
member.returns: The total number of inline links present in all topics of the corpus.

member.name: M:Panini.ViewModel.SummaryViewModel.get_count_of_all_existing_links
member.summary: Counts all links in topics of the corpus.
member.returns: The total number of links (inline + related) present in all topics of the corpus.

member.name: M:Panini.ViewModel.SummaryViewModel.get_count_of_all_matching_links
member.summary: Counts all proposed as similar topics which are already linked in the topics.
member.returns: The total number of similar topic suggestions which are already linked in the topics.

member.name: M:Panini.ViewModel.SummaryViewModel.get_count_of_all_links_to_be_integrated
member.summary: Counts the similar topics which can be integrated as links in the topics.
member.returns: The difference between the total number of suggested similar topics and the matching links that link to some of suggested similar topics.

member.name: M:Panini.ViewModel.SummaryViewModel.get_count_of_all_obsolete_links
member.summary: Counts the obsolete links in all topics of the corpus.
member.returns: The total number of links which can be removed/replaced depending on better link proposals to other similar topics.

member.name: M:Panini.ViewModel.SummaryViewModel.get_full_heatmap_data
member.summary: Gets the heatmap data (axis labels and similarity scores) when the number of topics is less than or equal to the window size in the preview. In this case, the preview heatmap is not generated as the number of topics is low enough to fit in main heatmap.
member.returns: The axis labels and similarity scores for plotting the main heatmap.

member.name: M:Panini.ViewModel.SummaryViewModel.generate_preview_map
member.summary: Generates and updates the heatmap preview.

member.name: M:Panini.ViewModel.SummaryViewModel.generate_heat_map
member.summary: Generates and updates the main heatmap.

member.name: M:Panini.ViewModel.SummaryViewModel.refresh_heat_map
member.summary: Refreshes both the heatmaps.

member.name: M:Panini.ViewModel.SummaryViewModel.get_color_scheme
member.summary: Gets the colors corresponding to the scheme of the heatmap configured by the user in the settings view.
member.returns: The list of colors used by the color pallete of the heatmap.

member.name: M:Panini.ViewModel.SummaryViewModel.generate_nlp_data
member.summary: Generates the summary NLP information to be displayed in the summary view.

member.name: M:Panini.ViewModel.SummaryViewModel.get_partial_heatmap_data
member.summary: Gets the partical data of the heatmap depending on the horizontal and vertical slider positions on the heatmap preview.
member.returns: The axis labels and similarity scores for the partial window to be displayed in the main heatmap.
